original_title: Dozen injured after bus veers off road in Watawala
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – 12 people have been injured after a bus plying from Colombo to Nuwara Eliya veered off the road in Watawala.
The accident was reported at about 04:30 am on Tuesday (01), According to Sri Lanka Police.
The bus was trying to overtake another bus, when it had veered off the road and went down a precipice.
The 12 injured people are currently receiving treatment at the Watawala hospital.
